name: Necrobunnyland
description:
Game for Global Game Jam.

Keep war balance to get more likes from gods. Choose upgrades carefully as they affect both sides

[RMB] to move your character.
Cross the front line to change the side.
[1], [2], [3], [4] or [5] to change game's speed up to x10.
Don't let win any of the sides (even if you adore them).
Get the maximum amount of likes you can.

Credits: 

Vika Novoseletska - art, character design
Ivan Stupenko - game design, unity dev
Ivan Zasiadvovk- art and animation
Serhii Yeryfa - unity dev
Denis Volchenkov - narrative/sound/game design
